title: Sony E3 Press Conference 2017: Shadow of the Colossus, God of War and CoD:WW2 | Trusted Reviews
description:
![the last of us
2](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-reviews-
placeholder-3.svg)

**Sony’s annual E3 presser is over, and the producer of all things PlayStation
put on a relatively tame showing this year. The highlights for us were the
Shadow of the Colossus remake and Monster Hunter finally coming to PS4. We
would have loved to see more solid release dates for first-party exclusives,
though.  
**  
 _TrustedReviews_ compiled all the news, announcements and trailers you might
need from Sony’s E3 2017 press conference. Read on to find out more.

## Sony E3 press conference – As it happened

**0254:** Insomniac Games’ [Spider-
Man](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/spider-man-ps4-release-date-trailer-
gameplay-pre-order) adaptation is closing the show this year with an extensive
gameplay demo. The web-slinger is capable of using environmental traps to lure
in and defeat enemies. Of course, hand-to-hand combat is a perfectly viable
option, too. Spidey is coming to PS4 in 2018, just like nearly everything else
from Sony’s presser this year. **  
**

**  
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K4zm30yeHHE**

**0250:**[Destiny 2](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/destiny-2-news-
release-date-trailer-gameplay-pre-order) receives a new trailer exploring its
story missions, including an introduction for the sci-shooter’s antagonist.
Come September 8, you and your fellow guardians can take him on and so much
more. **  
**

**  
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GRxujNsWNiQ**

**0244:** Quantic Dream’s [Detroit: Become
Human](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/detroit-become-human-release-date-
trailer-gameplay-pre-order) is up next. The cyberpunk noir-thriller has a new
trailer backed up by an android singing a little song. How cute. Now it’s
gotten a tad more serious, with our heroes planning some form of uprising
inside a futuristic city. **  
**

**  
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jTvu3q-fqAE**

**0238:** [God of War](https://www.trustedreviews.com/god-of-war-ps4-review)
is back again with yet another stunning gameplay demo. Kratos is once again
hanging out with his son, and the two are beginning to delve further into the
game’s potential narrative. The infant will play a bigger role than we
expected, and could accompany our hero throughout the entire game! God of War
is coming to PS4 in Early 2018.

**0233:** Sony has announced Star Child for PlayStation VR. It appears to be a
sci-fi platformer with more than a little bit of heart. The virtual reality
streak continues with Supermassive Games’ The Inpatient. Until Dawn was just
the beginning it seems. The VR train doesn’t stop there! [Final Fantasy
XV](https://www.trustedreviews.com/final-fantasy-15-review) Universe is a PSVR
exclusive add-on for the JRPG that lets you hang out with your favourite
monster-slaying boyband. **  
**

**  
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q8Ggl421myE**

**0231:** Bethesda’s [Skyrim](https://www.trustedreviews.com/the-elder-
scrolls-v-skyrim-review) is coming to [PlayStation
VR](https://www.trustedreviews.com/playstation-vr-review)! Nope, we’re being
totally serious. It lacks the visual fidelity of the original game, but should
make for a fun VR distraction. **  
**

**0228:** Sledgehammer Games’ [Call of Duty:
WW2](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/call-of-duty-ww2-release-date-
trailers-multiplayer-gameplay-pre-order-screenshots-system-requirements) looks
smashing on PS4 as we finally catch a glimpse at the shooter’s multiplayer.
The globe-trotting adventure is set to be tense, explosive and faithful to its
historical origins to boot. **  
**

**  
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=42GiPMtJ-1I**

**0225:** Next up is [Marvel vs Capcom:
Infinite](https://www.trustedreviews.com/marvel-vs-capcom-infinite-review),
the crossover fighter coming to consoles and PC this September. It looks fun,
chaotic and perfect fuel for comic-book lovers and gaming fans alike. **  
**

**0224:** Team Ico’s [Shadow of the
Colossus](https://www.trustedreviews.com/Shadow-of-the-Colossus-review) has
been remade from the ground-up on PS4, and it looks absolutely breathtaking.
It’s coming in 2018. **  
**

**  
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pdZQ98mWeto**

**0220:** Capcom’s Monster Hunter is coming to PS4. The cult series is making
its debut on Sony’s console with Monster Hunter World. Count us in. **  
**

**  
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=db1yDEia_gg**

**0217:** PlayStation Head Shawn Layden is now on stage to introduce tonight’s
show, which’ll include a bunch of PS4 and PSVR games we can expect to play in
the coming months and years. **  
**

**0210:** After a show-stopping reveal last year, Sony Bend’s [Days
Gone](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/days-gone-release-date-gameplay-
trailer-pre-order-ps4-pro) is back once again with a gorgeous, rain-drenched
demo showcasing the bleak open-world. The demo confirms rideable motorcycles,
spooky zombie dogs and incredibly violent bandits. Just the usual stuff then…
**** The horrifying hordes of undead can easily overwhelm our hero, so you
best keep quiet if you want to survive. **** Oh, and ZOMBIE BEARS! **  
**

**  
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Nd0d0CKwsk8**

**0207:** Next up is a little something from Guerilla Games. [Horizon Zero
Dawn](https://www.trustedreviews.com/horizon-zero-dawn-review): The Frozen
Wilds is a new DLC pack coming to the epic PS4 adventure. **  
**

**  
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J5xsS1WZA54**

**0203:** Sony’s annual press conference has begun! Once again, the
PlayStation giant is kicking things off with an oddly charming bit of live
music. This time, it’s themed to the tune of [Uncharted: The Lost
Legacy](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/uncharted-4-the-lost-legacy-
release-date-trailer-gameplay-characters-story). Chloe Frazer’s solo adventure
is coming to PS4 later this year, and looks like enough bullseye for Naughty
Dog.

## Sony E3 Press Conference Livestream – Where can I watch it?

You can catch the conference across a variety of different websites, such as
Sony’s [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/user/PlayStation),
[Twitch](https://www.twitch.tv/playstation), and through the [PlayStation
Blog](https://blog.eu.playstation.com/).
